summary: Feature request to expose internal-non-workflow-common functionality to users, either by adding it to the API reference or restructuring internal packages to provide a non-workflow public entry point.
userImpact: Users currently need to reference internal package files directly, making it difficult to use non-workflow common functionality without relying on implementation details.
rootCause: Non-workflow common utilities are in internal packages without a stable public API or documented entry point.
proposedFix: Either add the internal-non-workflow-common package to the API reference or restructure internal packages into a 'common' folder with a separate '@temporalio/common/non-workflow' entry point.
workaround: Users can import directly from the GitHub repository: `import { encodeToPayload, loadDataConverter } from '@temporalio/internal-non-workflow-common'`
keyQuote: Either: Add to API ref - Combine internal* packages into `common`, using a separate folder & entry point for any non-workflow APIs
